sentence in indonesian using the words: Situasi pertandingan itu sangat menegangkan
english translation: That game situation was very tense

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah cinta sejatiku
english translation: He/She is my true love

english translation: He/She always appears calm in every situation

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pertandingan harus berjalan adil untuk semua

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kejadian itu sangat memalukan baginya
english translation: That incident was very embarrassing for him/her

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak-anak memiliki imajinasi yang kuat

english translation: He/She does his/her work with high passion

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku merasa jijik melihatnya

sentence in indonesian using the words: Suasana hatiku sedang bahagia hari ini

sentence in indonesian using the words: Siapa yang punya kunci tersebut?
english translation: Who has the key?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pilihan sulit antara dua hal yang baik
english translation: A difficult choice between two good things

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong bawa makanan dan minuman
english translation: Please bring food and drinks

sentence in indonesian using the words: Astaga, apa yang terjadi di sini?
english translation: Oh my, what is happening here?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia tampan dan cerdas pula
